info.title: redisEnterprise
info.description: REST API for managing Redis Enterprise resources in Azure.

get.description: Lists all of the available REST API operations of the Microsoft.Cache provider.

200.description: Success. The response describes the list of operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The region the operation is in.

200.description: Success. The detailed status of the operation is in the response.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates an existing (overwrite/recreate, with potential downtime) cache cluster

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Create RedisEnterprise operation.

201.description: The cluster was/is being created. Check provisioningState to see detailed status.

200.description: The cluster was/is being updated. Check provisioningState to see detailed status.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Update RedisEnterprise operation.

200.description: The cluster was/is being updated. Check provisioningState to see detailed status.

202.description: The cluster update operation was started. GET the URL in the Azure-AsyncOperation or Location headers to retrieve updated status.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: The cluster was successfully deleted.

202.description: The cluster delete operation was successfully started. GET the URL in the Azure-AsyncOperation or Location headers to retrieve updated status.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about a RedisEnterprise cluster

200.description: The request succeeded, response body contains the requested details.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all RedisEnterprise clusters in a resource group.

200.description: The list of RedisEnterprise clusters

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets all RedisEnterprise clusters in the specified subscription.

200.description: The list of RedisEnterprise clusters

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets all databases in the specified RedisEnterprise cluster.

200.description: The list of databases

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update database operation.

200.description: The database was/is being updated. Check provisioningState for detailed status.

201.description: The database was/is being created. Check provisioningState for detailed status.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update database operation.

200.description: The database was/is being updated. Check provisioningState for detailed status.

202.description: The database update operation was successfully started. GET the URL in the Azure-AsyncOperation or Location headers to retrieve updated status.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about a database in a RedisEnterprise cluster.

200.description: Successfully found the database

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Successfully deleted the database.

202.description: The database delete operation started. GET the URL in the Azure-AsyncOperation or Location headers to retrieve updated status.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Retrieves the access keys for the RedisEnterprise database.

200.description: The access keys for the specified database.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Regenerates the RedisEnterprise database's access keys.

200.description: Returns the new access keys for the database

202.description: The cluster update operation was started. GET the URL in the Azure-AsyncOperation or Location headers to retrieve updated status.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Imports a database file to target database.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Storage information for importing into the cluster

200.description: Import operation succeeded.

202.description: The import operation was started. GET the URL in the Azure-AsyncOperation or Location headers to retrieve updated status.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Exports a database file from target database.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Storage information for exporting into the cluster

200.description: Export operation succeeded.

202.description: Export operation successfully enqueued; follow the Location header to poll for final outcome.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the private endpoint connections associated with the RedisEnterprise cluster.

200.description: OK -- Successfully retrieved private endpoint connections.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the specified private endpoint connection associated with the RedisEnterprise cluster.

200.description: OK -- Get the private endpoint connection properties successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Updates the state of the specified private endpoint connection associated with the RedisEnterprise cluster.

201.description: OK -- Update the private endpoint connection properties successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified private endpoint connection associated with the RedisEnterprise cluster.

200.description: OK -- Delete the private endpoint connection successfully.

204.description: No Content -- The private endpoint connection does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the private link resources that need to be created for a RedisEnterprise cluster.

200.description: Successfully retrieved private link resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

Sku.description: SKU parameters supplied to the create RedisEnterprise operation.

name.description: The type of RedisEnterprise cluster to deploy. Possible values: (Enterprise_E1, EnterpriseFlash_F300 etc.)

capacity.description: The size of the RedisEnterprise cluster. Defaults to 1. Valid values are 1 or more (and may depend on SKU tier).

sku.description: The SKU to create, which affects price, performance, and features.

zones.description: The zones where this cluster will be deployed.

ClusterUpdate.description: A partial update to the RedisEnterprise cluster

sku.description: The SKU to create, which affects price, performance, and features.

ClusterProperties.title: RedisEnterprise cluster properties
ClusterProperties.description: Properties of RedisEnterprise clusters, as opposed to general resource properties like location, tags

minimumTlsVersion.description: The minimum TLS version for the cluster to support, e.g. '1.2'

hostName.description: DNS name of the cluster endpoint

redisVersion.description: Version of redis the cluster supports, e.g. '6'

privateEndpointConnections.description: List of private endpoint connections associated with the specified RedisEnterprise cluster

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page of results.

ClusterList.description: The response of a list-all operation.

Database.description: Describes a database on the RedisEnterprise cluster

DatabaseUpdate.description: A partial update to the RedisEnterprise database

DatabaseProperties.title: RedisEnterprise database properties
DatabaseProperties.description: Properties of RedisEnterprise databases, as opposed to general resource properties like location, tags

clientProtocol.description: Specifies whether redis clients can connect using TLS-encrypted or plaintext redis protocols. Default is TLS-encrypted.

port.description: TCP port of the database endpoint. Specified at create time. Defaults to an available port.

evictionPolicy.description: Redis eviction policy - default is VolatileLRU

modules.description: Optional set of redis modules to enable in this database - modules can only be added at creation time.

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page of results.

DatabaseList.description: The response of a list-all operation.

Persistence.title: Persistence settings
Persistence.description: Persistence-related configuration for the RedisEnterprise database

Module.title: Module settings
Module.description: Specifies configuration of a redis module

name.description: The name of the module, e.g. 'RedisBloom', 'RediSearch', 'RedisTimeSeries'

args.description: Configuration options for the module, e.g. 'ERROR_RATE 0.00 INITIAL_SIZE 400'.

version.description: The version of the module, e.g. '1.0'.

AccessKeys.title: Access keys
AccessKeys.description: The secret access keys used for authenticating connections to redis

primaryKey.description: The current primary key that clients can use to authenticate

secondaryKey.description: The current secondary key that clients can use to authenticate

RegenerateKeyParameters.title: Regenerate access keys request
RegenerateKeyParameters.description: Specifies which access keys to reset to a new random value.

ImportClusterParameters.title: Import an RDB file into a target database

sasUri.description: SasUri for the target blob to import from

ImportClusterParameters.description: Parameters for a Redis Enterprise import operation.

ExportClusterParameters.title: Export an RDB file into a target database

sasUri.description: SasUri for the target directory to export to

ExportClusterParameters.description: Parameters for a Redis Enterprise export operation.

OperationStatus.description: The status of a long-running operation.

startTime.description: The start time of the operation.

endTime.description: The end time of the operation.

status.description: The current status of the operation.

error.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

Operation.title: REST API Operation
Operation.description: Details of a REST API operation, returned from the Resource Provider Operations API

name.description: The name of the operation being performed on this particular object. It should match the action name that appears in RBAC / the event service. Examples: "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/write", "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/capture/action"

isDataAction.description: Whether the operation applies to data-plane. This is "true" for data-plane operations and "false" for ARM/control-plane operations.

display.description: Contains the localized display information for this particular operation / action.

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name, e.g. Microsoft Monitoring Insights" or "Microsoft Compute"

resource.description: The localized friendly form of the resource type related to this action/operation. It should match the public documentation for the resource provider, e.g. "Virtual Machines" or "Job Schedule Collections"

operation.description: Required.The localized friendly name for the operation, as it should be shown to the user. It should be concise (to fit in drop downs) but clear (i.e. self-documenting), e.g. "Create or Update Virtual Machine", "Restart Virtual Machine"

description.description: Required.The localized friendly description for the operation, as it should be shown to the user. It should be thorough, yet concise. It will be used in tool tips and detailed views.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation; governs the display of the operation in the RBAC UX and the audit logs UX. Default value is "user,system"

actionType.description: Enum. Indicates the action type. "Internal" refers to actions that are for internal only APIs.

OperationListResult.description: A list of REST API operations supported by an Azure Resource Provider. It contains an URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of operations supported by the resource provider

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results (if there are any).

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group.

ClusterNameParameter.name: clusterName
ClusterNameParameter.description: The name of the RedisEnterprise cluster.
